description:
Module implementing the sumproduct functions from Excel 2003 math library.
 There are 30 functions defined, implementing the same function
 but with 1 to 30 parameters.
 Each parameter can be a sequence of infinite length.

functions.name: sumproduct
functions.signature: ($array1 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType
functions.description:
Sums the values in the sequence.
 The sequence can be of any length.
functions.summary: Sums the values in the sequence.

parameters.name: array1
parameters.description: the sequence of numbers or arguments castable to numeric

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if the parameters cannot be casted to numeric type</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: sumproduct
functions.signature: ($array1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array2 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array3 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array4 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array5 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array6 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array7 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array8 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array9 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array10 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType
functions.description:
Multiplies the elements on the same position in each sequence
 and sums up the results.
functions.summary: Multiplies the elements on the same position in each sequence and sums up the results.

functions.name: sumsq
functions.signature: ($numbers as xs:anyAtomicType+) as xs:anyAtomicType
functions.description:
Returns the sum of the squares of the arguments.
 It used the sumproduct function.
functions.summary: Returns the sum of the squares of the arguments.

parameters.name: numbers
parameters.description: the sequence of one or more numbers or arguments castable to numeric

returns.description: the sum of squared values, as numeric type

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if the parameters cannot be casted to numeric type</xqdoc:error>
